data.title: Early Silicon Graphics employee photo
data.meta_description: Stanford professor James Clark, left, co-founded SGI, which produced graphic display terminals and, later, complete workstations. Shown with Clark are (left to right) Marcia Allen, Diane Wilford, Kurt Akeley, Marc Hannah, Tom Davis, Rocky Rhodes and Mark Grossman.
data.text: Stanford professor James Clark, left, co-founded SGI, which produced graphic display terminals and, later, complete workstations. Shown with Clark are (left to right) Marcia Allen, Diane Wilford, Kurt Akeley, Marc Hannah, Tom Davis, Rocky Rhodes and Mark Grossman.
